idioms.reading: たびはみちづれよはなさけ
idioms.meaning: in traveling, a companion; in life, sympathy

idioms.reading: たびのはじはかきすて
idioms.meaning: once over the borders one may do anything

idioms.reading: たびはこころよはなさけ
idioms.meaning: in traveling, companionship; in life, kindness

idioms.reading: たびはなさけ、ひとはこころ
idioms.meaning: in traveling, a companion; in life, sympathy

idioms.word: かわいい子には旅をさせよ
idioms.reading: かわいいこにはたびをさせよ
idioms.meaning: spare the rod and spoil the child

lessons.japanese: アメリカ旅行のよい記念になります。
lessons.english: This will be a good souvenir of my trip around the United States.
How are you? Did you have a good trip?

lessons.japanese: この世界は本で、旅しない人は一ページしか読まない。
lessons.english: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page.
